org.jppf.jca.demo

Class JPPFHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jppf.jca.demo.JPPFHelper

  • public class JPPFHelper
extends Object
    Utility class for obtaining and releasing Resource adapter connections.

    • Field Detail

      • JNDI_NAME

        public static final String JNDI_NAME
        JNDI name of the JPPFConnectionFactory.

        This value is dependent on the application server used:

        • On Apache Geronimo: "jca:/JPPF/jca-client/JCAManagedConnectionFactory/eis/JPPFConnectionFactory"
        • On JBoss: "java:eis/JPPFConnectionFactory"
        • On Websphere: "java:comp/env/eis/JPPFConnectionFactory"
        • All other supported servers: "eis/JPPFConnectionFactory"
          See Also:
          Constant Field Values

      • Constructor Detail

        • JPPFHelper

          public JPPFHelper()

      • Method Detail

        • getConnection

          public static JPPFConnection getConnection()
                                    throws NamingException,
                                           ResourceException
          Obtain a JPPF connection from the resource adapter's connection pool. The obtained connection must be closed by the caller of this method, once it is done using it.
          Returns:
          a JPPFConnection instance.
          Throws:
          NamingException - if the connection factory lookup failed.
          ResourceException - if a connection could not be obtained.

        • getConnection

          public static JPPFConnection getConnection(String jndiName)
                                    throws NamingException,
                                           ResourceException
          Obtain a JPPF connection from the resource adapter's connection pool. The obtained connection must be closed by the caller of this method, once it is done using it.
          Parameters:
          jndiName - the jNDI name of the JPPF connection factory (application server-dependent).
          Returns:
          a JPPFConnection instance.
          Throws:
          NamingException - if the connection factory lookup failed.
          ResourceException - if a connection could not be obtained.

        • closeConnection

          public static void closeConnection(JPPFConnection connection)
                            throws ResourceException
          Close (release) the specified connection.
          Parameters:
          connection - the connection to close.
          Throws:
          ResourceException - if the connection could not be closed.

        • getStatusMap

          public static Map<String,JPPFJob> getStatusMap()
          Get the map used to lookup the jobs status.
          Returns:
          a mapping of jobs to their uuid.

        • getStatus

          public static String getStatus(String id)
          Get the status of the specified job.
          Parameters:
          id - the job uuid.
          Returns:
          a mapping of jobs to their uuid.

        • getJobName

          public static String getJobName(String id)
          Get the name of the specified job.
          Parameters:
          id - the job uuid.
          Returns:
          a mapping of jobs to their uuid.

        • getMessage

          public static String getMessage(String id)
          Format the results of the specified job.
          Parameters:
          id - the uuid of the job.
          Returns:
          the formatted resutls as a string.
